description:
Kyosuke accidentally makes plans to study with Madoka and go to the pool with Hikaru at the same time, but he can`t do both... can he?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu no Yuuwaku! Ikinari Double Date
Tentazioni d`estate! Ed è subito doppio appuntamento
The Summer Temptation - A Double Date Out of the Blue
夏の誘惑!いきなりダブルデート
